data.text: @ggoodwin284 @SamInBoston @mikesacconetv It’s not that it’s over it’s that they don’t need it anymore. Now they have Russia and the Ukraine
@nesafety343 @SamInBoston @mikesacconetv COVID's over....the polls said so!! You had two years of theatre and none of it worked. Time to move on, kids!!
@SamInBoston @lisakashinsky Yeah and just throw it away cuz there is zero chance of a variant.

@SamInBoston How does one justify removing their mask 😷after sporting it in their profile pic? Covid is still out there and you wear it because it keeps others safer… but will you remove it now because you are told it’s okay?
@SamInBoston @mikesacconetv Now do you think they’re going to save it just in case or just throw it away.
